hero_section.title: Welcome to SEC Restaurant
hero_section.description: Taste the heart of Egypt with our traditional dishes like tender hawawshi, flavorful molokhia, rich tajin pasta, and perfectly grilled kofta. Every meal is made with fresh ingredients and served with warm baladi bread. At SEC Restaurant, we bring authentic Egyptian flavors with quality and care in every bite.

offers_section.title: Special Offers
offers_section.noOffersContent: Unfortunately there is no available offers at the time.

locationSection.title: Location
locationSection.geoLocation: Port Said St, Bab El-Shaareya Sq, Cairo, EG

order_form.title: Sorry...
order_form.description: Sorry, but online ordering is not available at the time.

about_section.title: About Us
about_section.description: Set El Kol restaurant was established in 2024 with the aim of preserving authentic Egyptian cuisine and presenting it with a modern spirit, where we blend traditional flavors with contemporary presentation styles in an atmosphere inspired by the old Egyptian home, using fresh local ingredients and inherited cooking methods to offer our guests a warm dining experience that reflects Egypt’s identity in a way that suits our present time...

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To preserve and share the rich culinary heritage of Egypt while embracing modern dining experiences.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the premier destination for authentic Egyptian cuisine, known for quality and innovation.
